title: FederAI — Federated Learning Showcase
summary: Simple site + short video explaining Federated Learning, showcasing student posters and research from ART-IE.

title: Eindhoven Housing Visualization
summary: Interactive maps to help expats compare neighborhoods by price, schools, parks, and amenities.

title: JSL3 Website Redesign (Ambianti Internship)
summary: Redesigned the JSL3 website to improve navigation, onboarding, and learning tools—adding search, beginner guides, and a live Playground. Usability tests showed faster tasks and 100% completion.

title: Design System Seed
summary: A small, scalable set of UI primitives with tokens, states, and a11y baked in.
